events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because it's not what I paid for.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item delivery.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong product. I’m here to help you get this resolved as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can verify and process your refund?
I have attached the photo of the wrong item and here is my order number: 12345678. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for providing the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method and arrange a prepaid return label for you.
That sounds perfect, thanks for the quick response! I will return the package as soon as I get the label.
The refund has been processed and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to confirm that you received your refund and that the return went smoothly. Please contact us if there is anything else we can do.
We are closing this case now as resolved. Thank you for your cooperation, and have a great day!
